security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, no file system access, no network calls, no command execution. Provides architectural guidance for form creation patterns.

content.user_title: Create forms with validation and CRUD APIs
content.value_statement: Building forms and APIs requires consistent patterns for validation, type safety, and error handling. This skill provides ready-to-use templates for Zod schemas, React form components, and RESTful API routes so you can ship faster.
actual_capabilities: Generate Zod validation schemas with inferred TypeScript types
Create React form components using react-hook-form and Shadcn UI
Build RESTful CRUD API routes with pagination and error handling
Implement form state management with loading states and toast notifications
Apply authentication middleware to API endpoints
limitations: Does not generate database schema or ORM code
Does not create custom UI components beyond Shadcn
Does not handle file upload or multi-part form data

use_cases.title: Build type-safe forms
use_cases.description: Create validated forms with Zod schemas and react-hook-form in minutes instead of hours

use_cases.title: Ship complete API endpoints
use_cases.description: Generate CRUD API routes with authentication, validation, and consistent error responses

use_cases.title: Enforce coding standards
use_cases.description: Provide standardized patterns for forms and APIs across your codebase

prompt_templates.title: Simple form
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields using form-creator. Include validation for required fields and email format.

prompt_templates.title: Complex validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a registration form with password strength validation, confirm password matching, and custom Zod validators using form-creator.

prompt_templates.title: API integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a plans API with GET list, POST create, and PATCH update endpoints using form-creator. Include authentication middleware.

prompt_templates.title: Reusable form
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a reusable form component that handles both create and edit modes with initialData using form-creator patterns.

output_examples.input: Create a subscription form with email, plan type, and billing cycle fields
output: ‚úÖ Form schema created with Zod validation

best_practices: Always use Zod inferred types instead of any for full type safety
Reuse the same form component for create and edit operations
Wrap API routes in try/catch with consistent error responses
anti_patterns: Avoid using any type instead of Zod inferred types
Do not create separate components for create and edit forms
Do not skip loading states or error handling

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with Next.js, React, TypeScript, Zod, react-hook-form, and Shadcn UI components.

faq.question: How complex can the validation be?
faq.answer: Supports nested objects, arrays, regex patterns, custom validators, and conditional validation logic.

faq.question: Can I integrate with existing APIs?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill generates API routes that fit standard REST patterns and can connect to any backend.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a prompt-based skill with no code execution. It only generates patterns locally.

faq.question: What if the form does not work?
faq.answer: Check that you have all dependencies installed: react-hook-form, @hookform/resolvers/zod, and Shadcn components.

faq.question: How is this different from manual coding?
faq.answer: Provides proven patterns, consistent structure, and best practices so you avoid common mistakes.
